price: Guyyaa dhugaan iyyansa dhagayan, sun guyyaa (qabrii irraa) ba’iinsaati.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَسۡمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيۡحَةَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡخُرُوجِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yawma yasmaʿūna al-ṣayḥata bil-ḥaqi dhālika yawmu al-khurūji
